name: Amexio Fileupload
description: This component use for uploading all types of files.

properties.name: param-name
properties.description: Used to specify URL query , same with backend rest controller paramater object Default file

properties.name: file-type
properties.description: Defines the file type of file to upload. Shows only given file type at the time of file upload.example for 1.image [file-type]=image/* 2.for pdf [file-type]=application/pdf

properties.name: multiple-file
properties.description: Defines if there are multiple file to upload
